attributes.action: Give sanctuary to the Afghan junior girls soccer team.
attributes.additional_details: If not saved, the girls will have to go back to Afghanistan when their Pakistan visas expire to almost certain retaliation from the Taliban
attributes.background: The Afghan girls soccer team are on the run and have been threatened by the Taliban. They are currently hiding in Pakistan with their families.

rejection.details: Since you started your petition it has been confirmed that the junior female football team and their immediate families are to relocate to Britain from Pakistan
